original_text: Some women were also there. They were watching these events from a long way away. Mary from Magdala was one of the women. Mary the mother of the younger James and Joses was also there. Salome was there too.
korean_text: 멀리서 바라보는 여자들도 있었는데 그 중에 막달라 마리아와 또 작은 야고보와 요세의 어머니 마리아와 또 살로메가 있었으니

sentences.original_text: Mary from Magdala was one of the women
sentences.korean_translation: 막달라 마리아는 그 여성 중 한 명이었습니다

sentences.original_text: Mary the mother of the younger James and Joses was also there
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 야고보와 요세의 어머니인 마리아도 그곳에 있었습니다
